settings.title: Performance Bloodwork
settings.subtitle: The science-based bloodwork, analysis and programming chosen by the world’s top athletes and performers to maximize physiological potential
settings.anchor-link-text: Join the waitlist to receive an exclusive invitation to Vitality Blueprint

settings.title: Heart rate. Sleep. Recovery. But do you really know if your body is optimized to perform?
settings.subtitle: Your watch tells you stats.
settings.caption: Vitality Blueprint will uncover your unique physiology and show you a clear path to the next level.

settings.title: It’s you, in top form.
settings.subtitle: Vitality Blueprint is the product of years of proven practice and coaching from Dan Garner and Andy Galpin PhD.

settings.title: 100+ Biomarkers
settings.text: The most comprehensive performance blood panel in the world — we assess over 100 biomarkers on their own, in categories, and in performance patterns to build a complete view of you physiology with a bias towards maximizing potential.

settings.title: Optimal Ranges
settings.text: Our tests and ranges are benchmarked against performance individuals, not against the population average. Vitality gives you a clear view of world class ranges for your demographic and performance objectives.

settings.title: Vitality Patterns
settings.text: Performance categories and patterns go beyond traditional blood panels by classifying biomarkers into thematic groups that influence key areas of performance like sleep, focus, and strength. Patterns identify barriers to performance indicated by proprietary marker combinations in a straightforward and actionable way.

settings.title: Test
settings.text: Visit Vitality’s nationwide lab network with over 2,000 locations for a blood draw.

settings.title: Analyze
settings.text: Then, Vitality gets to work looking at over 100 biomarkers, assessing markers individually and in proprietary categories and combinations.  Your panels and results automatically flow into your personalized performance dashboard (view a sample).

settings.title: Improve
settings.text: Individual biomarkers and multi-factor patterns identify and classify the largest constraints to your personal performance and show you how to address and remove each constraint through specific nutritional, lifestyle, and activity recommendations.   Re-testing lets you visualize progress and maintain programming sensitive to the latest changes in your body.

settings.title: Sean O’Malley
settings.subtitle: UFC Champion
settings.text: After years of unsuccessfully trying to “decode” myself, I’m so very grateful to be working with the team now. The results exceeded my already high expectations. I really can’t put all the emotions into words.

settings.title: Timothy Jones
settings.subtitle:
CEO, Precision
Nutrition
settings.text: Engaging Vitality marked a transformative chapter in my personal and professional life.  Facing a major injury at 47, which took a toll on me mentally, physically, and emotionally, Dan's intervention was crucial. His expertise in blood lab analysis led to personalized, life-revitalizing strategies.  Today, my thinking is sharper, and I've seen a significant uplift in my decision-making skills, energy levels, and engagement in professional and family life. Remarkably, my productivity has skyrocketed, and I feel in the prime of my health, confidently training alongside those 20 years my junior.

settings.title: Ryan Bader
settings.subtitle:
World Heavyweight
Champion
settings.text: I worked with Dan Garner and the Vitality team for a couple title fights and I wish I had known about him earlier. His process was so thorough and comprehensive, beyond anything I have done before. It was my first deep dive into my biology. Previously I had covered all my basis as far training etc, this was one area of improvement that I could utilize and take myself to the next level. This will not only elevate an athletes career but will elevate anyones life!

settings.title: Mark bell
settings.subtitle: World Heavyweight Champion
settings.text: Just did a physical and had a blood panel done. Massive Improvements!! I haven’t had a fasting glucose below 98 and cholesterol under 200 since I started getting my labs done in the US. Just did a physical and had a blood panel done. Massive Improvements!! I really can’t put all the emotions into words.

settings.title: Tailored Programming
settings.subtitle: Vitality Blueprint helps high performers in every field

settings.title: Single
settings.text: Establish where you stand with an annual checkpoint and personalized performance plan

settings.title: Semi-annual
settings.text: Re-test at month 6 to track progress and update your performance plan to match your most current opportunities

settings.title: Quarterly
settings.text: Lock-in a near realtime view of your physiology and identify fresh programming each quarter
